mapper.update: update injection_label_value set INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LABEL_VALUE = #{labelValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE_NAME = #{valueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE_DESC = #{valueDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LABEL_VALUE_ID = #{labelValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select LABEL_VALUE_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, LABEL_VALUE, VALUE_NAME, VALUE_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_value where LABEL_VALUE_ID = #{labelValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select LABEL_VALUE_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, LABEL_VALUE, VALUE_NAME, VALUE_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_value

select LABEL_VALUE_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, LABEL_VALUE, VALUE_NAME, VALUE_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_value where INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{labelId}
